resumeItems.title: RapidCars.com
resumeItems.description: Hobby site I started in high school featuring high resolution photos, news, and various information on high-end exotic cars such as those from Ferrari, Lamborghini, McLaren, and Porsche.  Received millions of visitors with traffic peaking at 10k users per day.  Built up traffic via SEO, email campaigns, and banner advertising.  Optimized site to earn revenue via advertisements with peak earnings ranging from $1k to $2k per month.  Decided to shutdown in 2016 as the site was no longer able to compete with professional automotive blogs.
